user.title: Set up HomeGlo Services
user.description: This integration provides services to control HomeGlo. Make sure the HomeGlo addon is installed and running before proceeding.

step_up.name: Step Up
step_up.description: Increase brightness by one step along the glo curve

step_down.name: Step Down
step_down.description: Decrease brightness by one step along the glo curve

reset.name: Reset
reset.description: Reset area to current time, enable HomeGlo, and apply glo

homeglo_on.name: HomeGlo On
homeglo_on.description: Turn on lights to last state and enable HomeGlo glo mode for an area

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to enable HomeGlo for

homeglo_off.name: HomeGlo Off
homeglo_off.description: Turn off lights and disable HomeGlo for an area

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to turn off and disable HomeGlo for

homeglo_deactivate.name: HomeGlo Deactivate
homeglo_deactivate.description: Disable HomeGlo for an area (lights remain in current state)

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to deactivate HomeGlo for (lights remain unchanged)
